participant_1.background:
I watched a lot of sports last year and kept my home clean and tidy.
I'm not worried about what others think of my appearance as long as I feel comfortable in my own skin.
i m scared of clowns.
i wish i could live forever.
I believe in a progressive tax system, which means that people with higher incomes pay a higher percentage of their income in taxes than people with lower incomes

participant_2.background:
I'm pretty relaxed about my appearance, as long as I'm comfortable.
i like going to the beach.
i am really excited to see how game of thrones ends.
i am a soccer player.
My earliest memory is of playing in the woods behind my house.

content.text: I hope you have a great day!
I'm not too worried about what others think of my appearance as long as I feel comfortable in my own skin, how about you?
Same here! I have never been much of a fashionista.
Well that's good, I don't have the money to be one anyway lol. What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go to the beach, read, and watch soccer.
I love to read too! What are you reading right now?
I am reading the book of the long sun by Gene Wolfe.
Oh wow, I've never heard of that before. What is it about?
It's about a group of people who are exiled to a faraway planet and have to find their way back to civilization.
That sounds really interesting! I might have to check it out.
